Package org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.sms

Class SmsResourceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.sms.SmsResourceProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.services.descriptor.Describable<org.forgerock.api.models.ApiDescription,​org.forgerock.json.resource.Request>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmsCollectionProvider, SmsSingletonProvider
    public abstract class SmsResourceProvider
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.services.descriptor.Describable<org.forgerock.api.models.ApiDescription,​org.forgerock.json.resource.Request>
    A base class for resource providers for the REST SMS services - provides common utility methods for navigating SMS schemas. It implements basic functionality such as reading of schema, template and creatable types, while allowing all of those mechanisms to be overridden by more specific subclasses.
    Since:
    13.0.0

      • getServiceConfigManager

        protected ServiceConfigManager getServiceConfigManager​(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context)
                                                throws SSOException,
                                                       SMSException
        Gets a ServiceConfigManager using the SSOToken available from the request context.
        Parameters:
        context - The request's context.
        Returns:
        A newly-constructed ServiceConfigManager for the appropriate serviceName and serviceVersion.
        Throws:
        SMSException - From downstream service manager layer.
        SSOException - From downstream service manager layer.

      • parentSubConfigFor

        protected ServiceConfig parentSubConfigFor​(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                           ServiceConfigManager scm)
                                    throws SMSException,
                                           SSOException,
                                           org.forgerock.json.resource.NotFoundException
        Gets the ServiceConfig parent of the parent of the config being addressed by the current request.
        Parameters:
        context - The request context, from which the path variables can be retrieved.
        scm - The ServiceConfigManager. See getServiceConfigManager(Context).
        Returns:
        The ServiceConfig that was found.
        Throws:
        SMSException - From downstream service manager layer.
        SSOException - From downstream service manager layer.
        org.forgerock.json.resource.NotFoundException - When some configuration in the parent path does not exist.

      • checkedInstanceSubConfig

        protected ServiceConfig checkedInstanceSubConfig​(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                                 String resourceId,
                                                 ServiceConfig config)
                                          throws SSOException,
                                                 SMSException,
                                                 org.forgerock.json.resource.NotFoundException
        Retrieves the ServiceConfig instance for the provided resource ID within the provided ServiceConfig parent instance, and checks whether it exists.
        Parameters:
        context - The request context.
        resourceId - The identifier for the config.
        config - The parent config instance.
        Returns:
        The found instance.
        Throws:
        SMSException - From downstream service manager layer.
        SSOException - From downstream service manager layer.
        org.forgerock.json.resource.NotFoundException - If the ServiceConfig does not exist.

      • addGlobalSchema

        protected void addGlobalSchema​(com.google.common.base.Optional<org.forgerock.services.context.Context> context,
                               org.forgerock.json.JsonValue result)
        Add the global attribute schema to the given JsonValue result.
        Parameters:

        result - The response body JsonValue.

      • addOrganisationSchema

        protected void addOrganisationSchema​(com.google.common.base.Optional<org.forgerock.services.context.Context> context,
                                     org.forgerock.json.JsonValue result)
        Add the organisation attribute schema to the given JsonValue result. The organisation attribute schema will be added at the root of the JSON response if the request is for realm based schema, but should be added under "defaults" when the request is for global schema, see SmsGlobalSingletonProvider.
        Parameters:
        context - The request context.
        result - The response body JsonValue.

      • addDynamicSchema

        protected void addDynamicSchema​(com.google.common.base.Optional<org.forgerock.services.context.Context> context,
                                org.forgerock.json.JsonValue result)
        Add the dynamic attribute schema to the given JsonValue result.
        Parameters:
        context - The request context.
        result - The response body JsonValue.

      • addGlobalAttributes

        protected void addGlobalAttributes​(ServiceConfig config,
                                   org.forgerock.json.JsonValue result)
        Add the global attributes to the given JsonValue result.
        Parameters:
        config - The SMS config from which to read the attributes.
        result - The response body JsonValue.

      • addOrganisationAttributes

        protected void addOrganisationAttributes​(String realm,
                                         ServiceConfig config,
                                         org.forgerock.json.JsonValue result)
        Add the organisation attributes to the given JsonValue result. The organisation attributes will be added at the root of the JSON response if the request is for realm based attributes, but should be added under "defaults" when the request is for global attributes, see SmsGlobalSingletonProvider.
        Parameters:
        realm - The realm/organisation where the attributes are stored.
        config - The SMS config from which to read the attributes.
        result - The response body JsonValue.

      • addDynamicAttributes

        protected void addDynamicAttributes​(String realm,
                                    org.forgerock.json.JsonValue result)
        Add the dynamic attributes to the given JsonValue result.
        Parameters:
        realm - The realm/organisation where the attributes are stored.
        result - The response body JsonValue.

                                                          org.forgerock.services.context.Context context)
                                                   throws org.forgerock.json.resource.InternalServerErrorException
        Returns the JsonValue representation of the ServiceConfig using the converter. Adds a _id property for the name of the config.
